DOC.brief_summary: This open-label ( physician healthy volunteer know medication administer ) , single-dose , 2-cohort , 3-period study characterize pharmacokinetics ( process drug fesoterodine absorb , distribute , metabolize , eliminate body ) effect food pharmacokinetics drug . This study take place approximately 8 week consist screen visit determine eligibility study , 2- 3-period treatment phase cohort .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Estimate The Effects Of Food On Drug Fesoterodine Fumarate And The Pharmacokinetics Of 5-Hydroxymethyl Tolterodine ( 5-HMT ) In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject 21 55 year age ( inclusive ) . Evidence history clinically significant disease . Evidence history urologic disease ( benign prostate hyperplasia , recurrent urinary tract infection , urinary retention , etc . ) .
